    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main entry point into the test server
      Arguments needed are: [port] [maxPlayers]
      void onMessageReceived(Player player, MessageType type, java.lang.Object message)
      Called when a message from a player is received
      void onPlayerConnect(Player player)
      Called when a player has been connected to the sever and before all the connection messages are sent
      void onPlayerDisconnect(Player player, boolean expected)
      Called when a player is disconnected for any reason
      If the disconnect was unexpected the player could have crashed or lost the connection
      An expected disconnect only happens if the player sends a message about it beforehand
      boolean onPrePlayerConnect(java.net.Socket socket)
      Called before the connection to the player is saved but after the check if there is room for the client

        public boolean onPrePlayerConnect(java.net.Socket socket)
        Description copied from interface: IServerMessageListener

      • onPlayerDisconnect

        public void onPlayerDisconnect(Player player,
                               boolean expected)
        Description copied from interface: IServerMessageListener
        Called when a player is disconnected for any reason
        If the disconnect was unexpected the player could have crashed or lost the connection
        An expected disconnect only happens if the player sends a message about it beforehand
        Specified by:
        onPlayerDisconnect in interface IServerMessageListener
        Parameters:
        player - The player that was disconnected
        expected - If the disconnect was expected or not

        message - The data that was sent with the message
